summary:
Persona is a popular video game series made by Atlus. It started in 1996 with *Revelations: Persona* on the PlayStation. The games are a spin-off from the Megami Tensei series, focusing on high school students with special powers called Personas.

The games are known for their unique blend of role-playing and social simulation. Players make friends, build relationships, and explore their characters' minds. The story often uses ideas from psychology, tarot cards, and mythology.

Persona has become a big success, selling over 22 million copies and inspiring many other media adaptations, like anime and manga.
title: Persona (series)
